name: Crash Cars - Driving Test Sim
description:
Experience the real crash tester’s career dealing with the endless city accidents! Cause the real car problems to learn more about its capacity, solidity, maneuverability and maybe even speed. Download Crash Cars - Driving Test Sim and learn more about the real car breaking rules: the more damage you cause – the more points you get!

Crash Cars - Driving Test Sim features:
• Unusual sports car crash test sim
• Cause accidents and brakes
• More damage = more points
• 5 interesting cars to test
• Various characteristics and upgrades
• Safety must be tested
• Awesome 3D atmosphere

Play Crash Cars - Driving Test Sim and learn more about the real crash testing rules: destroy, demolish, break, crash and exterminate all the obstacles on your way!
